chunk:
Directions: After cleansing, apply this rich cream to the entire face every night. For optimal results use after the Juice Beauty STEM CELLULAR Anti-Wrinkle Booster Serum

Warnings: For external use only. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with the eyes.
book: 0658-JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Anti-Wrinkle Overnight Cream
